definition: to sing the praises of/to extol/to eulogize
ode/eulogy/to praise in writing/to wish (in letters)

sentences.english: Use your own content to sing the praises of others in your topic.
sentences.chinese: 在你的论题中用自己的内容来歌颂他人。

sentences.english: This is the beauty of candles and silk praise the spirit of selfless dedication.
sentences.chinese: 这是用蜡烛和蚕丝来歌颂赞美无私奉献的精神。

sentences.english: Praise the LORD with harp: sing unto him with the psaltery and an instrument of ten strings.
sentences.chinese: 你们应当弹琴称谢耶和华，用十弦瑟歌颂他。

sentences.english: I will praise you, O Lord , among the nations; I will sing of you among the peoples.
sentences.chinese: 耶和华阿，我要在万民中称谢你，在列邦中歌颂你。

sentences.english: The salesman is carolling the glories of the company.
sentences.chinese: 推销员正在歌颂公司的辉煌成就。

sentences.english: He rhymed out sonnets in her praise.
sentences.chinese: 他写成押韵的十四行诗歌颂她。

sentences.english: In the Tang dynasty. At that time, a lot of poets wrote down many beautiful lines singing the moon.
sentences.chinese: 在唐朝，当时，很多诗人都留下了歌颂明月的佳句。

sentences.english: They sing a traditional New Year song of friendship called Auld Lang Syne .
sentences.chinese: 他们唱着歌颂友谊的传统新年欢歌《友谊地久天长》。

sentences.english: Sing unto him， sing psalms unto him， talk ye of all his wondrous works.
sentences.chinese: 要向他唱诗，歌颂，谈论他一切奇妙的作为。

sentences.english: Sing to him, sing praise to him; tell of all his wonderful acts.
sentences.chinese: 要向他唱诗，歌颂，谈论他一切奇妙的作为。

sentences.english: In the name of king singing, praises the unknown of the past.
sentences.chinese: 以王之名咏唱，歌颂那未知的过往。

sentences.english: A wine song singed by Chilean poet Pablo Neruda.
sentences.chinese: 这是智利诗人聂鲁达对于南美洲葡萄酒的歌颂。

sentences.english: National hero is the main eulogizing object in mythic epics and folk stories.
sentences.chinese: 民族英雄是神话史诗与民间故事歌颂传扬的主要对象。

sentences.english: First of all, the thoughts and feelings of extolling new life in " Litchi Honey " are false.
sentences.chinese: 首先，《荔枝蜜》歌颂新生活的思想感情是虚假的。

sentences.english: The night wind whirls in the sky and sings.
sentences.chinese: 夜间的威严在地面回旋，歌颂。

sentences.english: And when thro'death to life I've passed, Forevermore I'll sing of Thee.
sentences.chinese: 或经死亡进入永生，永永远远我歌颂你。

definition: a poem/a composition in verse/fig. epic (compared with historical epic)/the biblical Book of Psalms
to express (emotions in prose)/a written description (of emotions)
to compose (a piece of music)/(fig.) to create, by one's actions, a narrative (generally one that can be recounted with pride)
